verbs.description: " [V: Are] you saying this morning that Donald Trump is off the hook in the Mueller investigation ? "
" Are [ARG0: you] [V: saying] [ARGM-TMP: this morning] [ARG1: that Donald Trump is off the hook in the Mueller investigation] ? "
" Are you saying this morning that [ARG1: Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: off the hook] [ARGM-LOC: in the Mueller investigation] ? "
